reviewText:
This is the perfect gift for that female masturbater in your life that has everything.  The title says it all "The Key to a Woman's Pleasure".

This is more than a beginner's masturbater kit.  The tools provided in this set will help you become a master-masturbater, and maybe even a grand-master-masturbater.

A must have.
I think it would give some re-assurance to various culture backrounds if the partakers were at least 3 or 4 in a dvd and of diferrent origins.

nice, i enjoyed watching.  although i now understand the female body better, i still don't understand women. I guess they don't sell a product for that do they? overall: good video, worth the price.  women: jury is still out.

A sensational DVD that shows female masturbation as a full blown sexual activity that can take your sex life with your partner to a new level of pleasure. After I viewed it, I use the same masturbation techniques the woman was using (which is very different than how I usually masturbate) and I had the best full body orgasmic experience ever. And it did not end there. Usually when I masturbate, I often don't feel like having sex for a while afterwards but this time, I felt even more sexual. [...] I am very grateful that this woman would make herself so vulnerable to show others such an intimate experience that has taken my sex life with my partner to a new level. I definitively recommend this for both women and men!

This is the first and only DVDs I will buy from this company.  This could be possibly the worst instructional videos that you could buy.  I learned absolutely nothing, and the women were disgusting.  Trust me do not buy this DVD if your life depends on it.

This is one of the few "sex" videos out there that is actually sexy with out going over the top into eroticism or sterile unrealistic "how-to" lecturing. I watched this video alone first and enjoyed the information being demonstrated in such an exciting but tasteful way. I watched it again later with my husband and it really opened up the lines of communication for us. We had a fantastic time talking about it and making love afterwards. This video is very accessible to everyone interested in improving his or her sex life/relationship. The Welcomed Consensus has made another great video for us real people who want to bring more pleasure to our partners and our lives. Thank you!
